page.title: 07 Games to play
page.content: The game of Buckie has many different names such as{123 in, Pompom {123, Rin tin tin, Touch Buckie, See {Buckie, and 999 in.}This is how we play Buckie. You need a group of people. One of them is chosen to be Buckie and that person counts up to a number that has been decided by the group. While this person is counting the others hide. If he sees you he says "{Buckie 123 I see you}" and you have to come out of hiding and help find the others. If he has not seen you and you get to the post you say "{Buckie 123 all free}" and he is Buckie again. { }
